Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Thorndale
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Thorndale due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Thorndale due to a medical emergency on the tracks. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#36 Broadway

#151 Sheridan

#84 Peterson

#92 Foster

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Howard and Belmont in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to a medical emergency at Thorndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to a medical emergency on the tracks at Thorndale.

 Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to police activity. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#77 Belmont

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
